TopicTitle: The only time Val isn't smiling is on the menu screen.

Articles.Content: and I'm not sure what happened up there that caused her to stop smiling, but it's saddening.
She's not smiling on the title screen because she's in space wearing a helmet without a faceplate.

She's not smiling on the title screen because she's in space wearing a helmet without a faceplate.

that is a good reason to be distressed.
I don't think that's actually Val anyway.
She's not smiling because of that glass-ceiling thing.
If I was one of the only edible things on someone's menu, I wouldn't be smiling either!
Perhaps she can't remember if she left the gas on at home.
She's sad that KIS/KAS aren't stock yet and therefore there isn't much for her to do on EVA.
